page.title: 15THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE
page.content: The land surrounding our area affects it a lot.This is due to the fact that many of the people who live in the village ,actually work away from the village. There are three R.A.F. stations in the proximity.These being: 1)R.A.F. CRANWELL 2)R.A.F. DIGBY 3)R.A.F. CONINGSBY All three have a lot of people in residence and it tends to be on the increase. There are also FIVE towns or cities that are within easy reach of {RUSKINGTON.}This and the R.A.F. tend to make the village a place where many people live, but only so that they can be within reach of their work and also away from work at home.
